page.title: 05JOBS
page.content: Within our block there seems to be a division of{employment}from area to area. The estate of Roseworth has about 58% of the male adult population in work whereas about 88% of those adults in private dwellings have jobs.About 25% of the children in our school have both parents working, albeit most mams work on a{part-time basis. Very few children leaving school at sixteen in the area find permanent full-time employment. I.C.I.Billingham is the largest single employer in the area although not necessarily in our "block".Male jobs vary from factory workers,{tradesmen, drivers,services and shops to {professional}grades of teachers, doctors etc. in our block. Female jobs being mainly part-time are office, hospital,pub,cleaning services and shops.Few people work on the land.
